value.title: StarCraft 2 - When a FFA is both INSANE and Smooth Brained | Beast of the Hill
value.excerpt: Beast of the Hill is a mod in Starcraft 2 that was created by Beastyqt where the aim is to occupy the red dot in the centre of the map.
